programme.title: Realtree Outdoors
programme.desc: Team Realtree hunt the river bottoms of Northeast Oklahoma.

programme.title: Roger Raglin Outdoors
programme.desc: Roger and Josh hunt for a trophy buck on the Mexican border.

programme.title: The Obsession of Carter Andrews
programme.desc: Carter Andrews is in Cape Cod in search of the best bluefin tuna bite in 10 years, but will the weather be in his favor?

programme.title: Trev Gowdy's Monster Fish
programme.desc: MASSIVE AFRICAN TIGERFISH. Head guides Stu Harley and Greg Ghaui of African Waters hunt for the record-breaking Tigerfish in the remote, murky waters of Tanzania.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: Dust off your chaps as Terry tests several things from the epic western The Harder They Fall, and a canteen buster test from Gunsmoke!

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: Terry channels his inner Jason Bourne to test some of the best moments from the series of films.

programme.title: Steve's Outdoor Adventures TV
programme.desc: Steve West hosts Marc Womac and his Sub 7 crew at the Ponderosa Ranch for spring turkey season to test the CVA scout .410 shotguns and the Pendleton Ammo TSS shells - then Travis Price fills his turkey tag on an Oregon gobbler.

programme.title: Hoge Wild
programme.desc: Lucas and Bill Petrus are back where it all started, chasing easterns in Lexington, TN and Nashville, TN.

programme.title: Survival Science
programme.desc: In this exciting episode we’ll find out the reasons why tree stand accidents happen and how we can prevent them. Cool science mixed with dynamic experiments send our hosts, our stunt team, and our special crash test dummies plummeting to the ground.

programme.title: Fight To Survive
programme.desc: In an isolated mountain river, Fisherman Dean Ririe becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder in water up to his neck. In icy waters that should kill a man, Dean fights for his life miles from help.

programme.title: Life on the Edge
programme.desc: In Kodiak, Nick Blanco takes a break from construction to go guiding to solve his financial problems, while in Cold Bay Steph Summerville guides her first wildfowl hunt of the season. At Volcano Bay, a salmon run brings out the bears causing the team to down tools.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's UNCHARTED
programme.desc: Jim ventures deeper into the Russian mountains to hunt for the rare Russian Golden Bear.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures
programme.sub-title: Bow Fishing Alligator Gar in Mississippi
programme.desc: This week Jim heads to Mississippi go Bow fishing for giant alligator gar.
